sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer" app>
		<v-img max-height="75" max-width="100" src="@/assets/atmlogo.jpg">
		
		</v-img>
		<v-divider></v-divider>

		<v-list>
			<v-list-item v-for="[icon, text] in links" :key="icon" link>
				<v-list-item-icon>
					<v-icon>{{ icon }}</v-icon>
				</v-list-item-icon>

				<v-list-item-content>
					<v-list-item-title>{{ text }}</v-list-item-title>
				</v-list-item-content>
			</v-list-item>
		</v-list>
	</v-navigation-drawer>
</template>
<script>

export default {
	name: 'Sidebar',
	data: () => ({
		cards: ['Today', 'Yesterday'],
		drawer: null,
		links: [
			['mdi-inbox-arrow-down', 'Inbox'],
			['mdi-send', 'Send'],
			['mdi-delete', 'Trash'],
			['mdi-alert-octagon', 'Spam'],
		],
	}),
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
